page.title: 06CLUBS AND HOBBIES
page.content: People go to{clubs}to enjoy themselves and do things that they can't do at home. There are lots of organised clubs for all ages in Woodhouse. All the children in our class are 11 years old.They all go to different clubs and some of them go to more than one.There are school clubs, and clubs in the area where we live. { Organised Clubs in School Art Athletics Computer Country Dancing Football Gym School-Disco {Outside School in Locality Anglican Young People's Association Church Choir Guides Ice Skating Nursing Cadets Scouts Swimming People do{hobbies}to pass the time away.Stamp collecting is very popular and has been around for over a 100 years now.A more recent hobby is Home Computers,which is just as popular. {Adam Bebbington/Susan May.Class 9 S.E.
